name: Air hockey hero
description:
Air hockey Hero

Top notch 3D game and super addictive for anyone who loves action packed air hockey gaming!
Play the game from different angles, challenge your friends or play against the house.

Air hockey is very addictive and fun to play regardless if you are young or old, and the game is simple!
All you have to do is to block the goal and swipe the puck across the board to score on the opponent.
You can play it fast or slow and anyway you like it.
So whats it gonna be, are you the next Air Hockey Hero?

No ads
No popups or additional in app purchases, just 100% pure play for as long as you want!

FEATURES:

- Great graphics
- 4 different angles to play
- Play agains the house
- Play against friends on multi touch
- Set score to win
- 5 different dificult levels
